name: Bagpipe Player File
summary: Learn about .BWW files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: BWW files can be printed to a music sheet with any standard printer.

description: File used by Bagpipe Player, a program used for playing bagpipe music written in BWW files; can be displayed as a musical chart in the Bagpipe Player and can also be played with MIDI or PC Speaker sound; uses a plain text format.
